testcase.name: AI Generation Flow › should show loading state during AI text generation
AI Generation Flow › should handle AI text generation errors gracefully
AI Generation Flow › should show loading state during AI image generation
AI Generation Flow › should display AI-generated image immediately after generation
AI Generation Flow › should update output type to VIDEO after AI image generation
AI Generation Flow › should disable generate buttons during any AI operation
AI Generation Flow › should preserve user text while showing AI-generated suggestions
Manual Composition Flow › should display the meditation builder interface
Manual Composition Flow › should preserve meditation text exactly as entered
Manual Composition Flow › should indicate PODCAST output type when no image is selected
Manual Composition Flow › should support very long meditation text
Manual Composition Flow › should clear text when user deletes it
Manual Composition Flow › should preserve text with special characters and line breaks
Media Preview › should display music selector interface
Media Preview › should display AI-generated image preview immediately after generation
Media Preview › should show image preview with clearly visible content
Media Preview › should allow removing AI-generated image
Media Preview › should update output type when image is added or removed
Media Preview › should handle missing or failed image previews gracefully
Media Preview › should persist image preview state after page interactions
Meditation Library - Listing › should display all meditations with correct state labels
Meditation Library - Listing › should show empty state message when no meditations are found
Meditation Library - Playback › should enable play button only for completed meditations
Meditation Library - Playback › should load player when a meditation is selected
Meditation Library - Error Handling › should show error message when playback fails with 409
